basics.name: Hubert Liang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

work.company: University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa Outreach College
work.summary: Communicate and collaborate with students to aid in language and curriculum development
highlights: Strengthen listening comprehension and oral production
Communicate with coordinator on student growth and tracking progress through paperwork

volunteer.position: Honolulu Community College Summer Engineering Program
volunteer.summary: Learned and applied various skills regarding computer science and engineering.
highlights: Applied Arduino programming in connecting LED displays and vehicular movement
Learned and utilized proper soldering techniques and wire stripping
Board Member, Grey Hats at UHM, 2022-Present
Board Member, UH Manoa Game Dev Club, 2022-Present
